TimeOfFlightCalibrationReader(AB[, database_dir])

TimeOfFlightCalibrator(AB, run[, init_rdf])

class e15190.neutron_wall.time_of_flight_calibration.Plotter¶

Plotter utility class.

This is an utility class to plot the results from TimeOfFlightCalibrator.

>>> calib = TimeOfFlightCalibrator('B', 4100)
>>> calib.fit_bar(bar=24) # will take a while
>>> fig, axes = Plotter.plot(calib, bar=24)
>>> plt.show()
